modName: The Witcher 2 - NilfGaardian Armor - Standalone - Robe - Light And Heavy
summary:
Add a fully playable, craftable, upgradable, enchantable (not tested at the moment), NilfGaardian Armor(s) to the game.
I'm not the Armor(s)/Mod author, all credits must goes to CDProjektRED (to The Witcher) and to LordOfWar. Thanks.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#f1c232][font=Verdana][u][b][size=3]#You want even more armors based on The Witcher 2, right? Me too! Just click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73854/?]here[/url]!
#Don't forget to support, with the ENDORSE button! Thanks!
#(Thx too, LOW)!

Add a fully playable, craftable, upgradable, enchantable (not tested at the moment), NilfGaardian Armor(s) to the game.
I'm not the Armor(s)/Mod author, all credits must goes to CDProjektRED (to The Witcher) and to LordOfWar. Thanks.
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]All I've done is to remove all the others armors used in The Witcher 2 Models with TES5Edit (+ meshes and textures manually), renamed the .esp (to be fully compatible with The Witcher 2 Models .esp) and pack all the meshes and textures files into a .bsa version.
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]NilfGaardian Armors:

Require Ebony Smithing Perk, Ebony Section.[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
The Armors:

[/size][/b][b][size=3]- NilfGaurdian Armor A,
[/size][/b][b][size=3]- NilfGaurdian Armor B (not on the screenshots).[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
The Helmets:

[/size][/b][b][size=3]- NilfGaurdian Helmet,
[/size][/b][b][size=3]- NilfGaurdian Winged Helmet.[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
The Gauntlets:

[/size][/b][b][size=3]- NilfGaurdian Gauntlets,
[/size][/b][b][size=3]-> (Only one version).[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
The Shield (and the Warhammer are) [s]is[/s] not included, sorry.[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
Enjoy.

Recommended mods:
([/size][/b][/u][/font][/color][color=#f1c232][font=Verdana][u][b][size=3]The file you requested was not found in our database.)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5588/?]The Witcher 2 Models by LordOfWar[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71912/?]JRC's Witcher Style Sword Pack by jrc0011

[/url]Thanks:

[/size][/b][/u][/font][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3060962/?][b][u][size=4]A huge thanks to my (Swedish) friend Excellentium/Rickard, for is amazing screenshots work![/size][/u][/b]
[u][b][size=3][/size][/b][/u][/url][color=#f1c232][font=Verdana][u][b][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/588817/?]A huge thanks to my (French) friend Marmotte, for is amazing screenshots work![/url]

____________

Thanks, Setvi.

CDProjekt is not my official partner. * (CDProjekt's general guidelines).

My others mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url]

[img]http://pre09.deviantart.net/2f1a/th/pre/f/2015/269/5/7/keep_calm_and_support_nilfgaard_by_kriss80858-d9axl4o.png[/img][/size][/b][/u][/font][/color][/center]
